entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Lock contention issue in Reflection backport to full framework #73130
  • LibraryImportGenerator ModeThatUsesBidirectionalShape_Missing_AllMethods_ReportsDiagnostic failure in CI #73127
    7.0.0
  • CLR errors #73126
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: A pattern for AOT-friendly source-generated `JsonConverterFactory`-based converters. #73124
  • HTTP/3: Alt-Used incorrectly added to request #73123
  • [Feature] - Add TOML to the officially supported File Configuration Providers alongside INI, JSON, and XML #73119

Closed

  • IdnMapping.GetAscii throws ArgumentException #72962
  • Assertion failed 'compCanHavePatchpoints()' during 'Importation' #73090
    7.0.0
  • WriteAllBytesAsync throws an exception : The process cannot access the file #73047
  • System.IO.Compression tests fail on android #36845
    7.0.0
  • Question: Is there any document about the dotnet dump/gcdump file specification #73107
  • MethodSignature undefined use of reference binding to null pointer type (per gcc -fsanitize=undefined) #73088
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Optimize Enumerable.Chunk #73134
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Update description #73133
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix execution of ilverify tests in outerloop runs #73132
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Reflection Invoke refactoring #73131
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete duplicate unwind info files #73129
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Update the asp.net spmi collection script #73125
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix typos #73122
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fix json Serializer (all Proprties should be used) #73121
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Improve morphing of bit comparisons to constant 0/1 #73120
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Add TPN entry for Date/Time processing algorithm #73128
    area-System.Runtime
  • 30% optimization of `DateTime.GetDate()`/`.Year/.Month/.Day/.DayOfYear` by 'Euclidean affine functions' #72712
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add documentation for hot/cold splitting #73029
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: have jit tail call stress avoid creating loops in some cases #73114
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't exclude .gz files from assets.zip #73077
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • [GC] Handle objects from frozen segments in GCHeap::IsEphemeral #73110
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove undefined behavior for address of null reference #73113
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Allocate string literals on frozen segments #49576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Collect crash dumps for aborting on Unix #73037
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [iOS] Remove unnecessary newline from CI script #67861
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-tvos
  • Fixed a WKS specific issue by not clobbering the heap_segment_saved_allocated #72923
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Initialize Generation Aware Analysis later #70764
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add localloc empty stack verification #73109
    area-ILVerification, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1914515 #73091
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Try enabling regions for native AOT. #69108
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] JIT: Avoid removing multi-use boxes #73014
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] fix logging in subtle crypto #73073
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix SerialPort memory leak when requests time out and no data is received #68014
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Implement new API GetEnumValuesAsUnderlyingType #73057
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, CoreClr
  • Enable more libraries tests #73104
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Bring back live host change #73095
  • Add non-generic Create method to DispatchProxy #73046
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
